parameters.query:
SELECT 
  fi.id,
  fi.name,
  fi.description,
  fi.price,
  fi.images,
  fi.colors,
  b.name as brand_name,
  c.name as category_name
FROM fashion_items fi
LEFT JOIN brands b ON fi.brand_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN categories c ON fi.category_id = c.id
WHERE fi.is_active = true
{% if $json.searchQuery.original !== '' %}
  AND (
    fi.name ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
    OR fi.description ILIKE '%{{ $json.searchQuery.original }}%'
  )
{% endif %}
{% if $json.searchQuery.colors.length > 0 %}
  AND fi.colors && ARRAY[{% for color in $json.searchQuery.colors %}'{{ color }}'{% if not loop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}]
{% endif %}
ORDER BY fi.popularity_score DESC
LIMIT {{ $json.maxResults }}
